main.name: Lea Mikulcov√°
main.description: I am a self-taught frontend developer and I use React to develop web applications
main.bio: Like many developers, I'm completely self-taught. My passion is to learn, and web development is a bottomless source of new concepts to explore! I like learning foreign languages, drawing, painting, sewing and taekwondo.
main.contactmessage: If you are looking for a React developer, you've found her!

education.description: I learned to work with: react hooks, react lazy, react content API, redux-saga, firebase
I learned how JavaScript REALLY works and why it is so tricky and awesome at the same time.

education.school: The Complete Web Developer in 2020: Zero to Mastery
education.description: I learned all the web development basics, also discovered and fell in love with React.

education.school: Complete Python Developer in 2020: Zero to Mastery
education.description: I took this course about halfway into the Complete Web Developer course. This course taught me basic programming principles and helped me wit JavaScript A LOT. Also I learned all the possibilities that Python offers. I learned the basics of web development, web scraping, machine learning and data science with Python.

work.title: Web Administrator
work.description: I managed contents on the corporate websites (20+). I worked with an in-house built custom CMS, which required cooperation with our backend developer. That's how I got the opportunity to get my hands on frontend (HTML, CSS, basic JavaScript) and backend (Ruby on Rails) code and decided to pursue programming as my new career.

projects.title: E-commerce demo
projects.category: A demo e-commerce project built using React, react-redux, redux-saga and Firebase.
projects.aboutProject: This project is a demonstration of an e-commerce website built with React (with Hooks), Redux-Saga and Styled Components on the frontend and Firebase and Node + Express on the backend. Payments are implemented using Stripe. Feel free to check out the project's GitHub repo, to see how it works please visit it live on Heroku.
